descriptionHtml:
[center]
[b][size=5][color=blue]===================[/color][/size][/b]
[b][size=6][color=green]Breton Longbow[/color][/size][/b]
[b][size=5][color=blue]===================[/color][/size][/b]

[b][size=5][color=green]Information[/color][/size][/b]

This mod adds a new bow to Skyrim. It is modeled after an English
style longbow. You can craft it at the forge. The bow is fairly strong so it
requires the advanced smithing perk. This is a work-in-progress
and I will continue to work on improving it.

Please let me know how you like it in the comments.

[b][size=5][color=green]Arrows and Quivers[/color][/size][/b]

Since I have received several inquiries as to where to find the arrows and quivers
seen in the screenshots I wanted to provide some information on it. The arrows
and quivers are actually from my other mod "Elven Weaponry", a conversion of
Adonnay's Elven Weaponry mod for Oblivion. You can find a link to Elven Weaponry
at the bottom of this page. It includes mainly swords but also has several arrow and
quiver types and even a couple more bows.

[b][size=5][color=green]Video[/color][/size][/b]

Big thank you to Brodual for featuring my Breton Longbow in his Skyrim Mods Weekly - Bits 'n' Bobs series. Check out his [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/Brodual?feature=plcp]YouTube Channel here![/url]

[youtube]XA3OIpKtY4k[/youtube]

[b][size=5][color=green]Installation[/color][/size][/b]

Download and install with Nexus Mod Manager.

Or download the file manually and extract to your
Steam\SteamApps\Common\Skyrim\Data folder using 7zip or winrar.

[b][size=5][color=green]Credits[/color][/size][/b]

Me - CageU
Mr. Dave - Better UVs, fixed nif and textures.
SithMaster2010 - Modified textures.


If you would like to use any part of this mod
in your own work please ask.

[b][size=5][color=green]Other Mods By Me[/color][/size][/b]

[b][u][color=red]Elven Weaponry[/color][/u][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13234]Download here![/url][/center]
author: cageu

files.name: Breton Longbow v01
files.changelogHtml: First release. Adds a new longbow to the game.

files.name: Breton Longbow v02
files.changelogHtml: Adjusted bow damage and speed values.

files.name: Breton Longbow v03
files.changelogHtml:
New string and leather textures.
New normal maps.
Adjusted UVs for better string and grip texture display and alignment.

files.name: Breton Longbow v03 Alternate Textures
files.changelogHtml:
New string and leather textures.
New normal maps.
Adjusted UVs for better string and grip texture display and alignment.

files.name: Breton Longbow v04
files.changelogHtml:
New fixed nif with better UVs by Mr. Dave.
New textures by Mr. Dave and modified by SithMaster2010 to look like yew wood.
Mr. Dave's original textures are available as an alternate download.

files.name: Breton Longbow v04 Alternate Textures
files.changelogHtml:
New fixed nif with better UVs by Mr. Dave.
New textures by Mr. Dave and modified by SithMaster2010 to look like yew wood.
Mr. Dave's original textures are available as an alternate download.
